incidents.name: DocSend unavailable

incident_updates.body: Issue is resolved. Customers could have experienced errors or long load times from 14:21 to 14:24 UTC and 15:32 to 15:31 UTC
DocSend is currently unavailable, we are investigating the issue.

incidents.name: Dash Answers was down for some users

incident_updates.body: Retroactive update - Dash Answers was unavailable for some users beginning around 11:30pm UTC on December 11th. This was due to an OpenAI outage. We are back up and running!

incidents.name: Desktop installer failing to download

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We are aware of reports regarding the desktop application meta-installer failing to download for some Windows users. Our team is currently investigating the issue.

incidents.name: Dropbox.com was down

incident_updates.body: Retroactive update - Dropbox.com was down for some users. We quickly identified and fixed the problem, so we're back up and running!
